title: Articles of visitation and enquiry concerning matters ecclesiastical exhibited to the ministers, church-wardens, and side-men of every parish within the diocese of Hereford, in the first episcopal visitation of the Right Reverend Father in God, Herbert by divine providence Lord Bishop of Hereford.
author: Church of England. Diocese of Hereford. Bishop (1662-1691 : Croft)
publisher: Printed for G. Bedell and T. Collins,
notes: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library and Pembroke College Library, Cambridge.
Twenty-first item in a collection of visitation articles.
